successes.title: ~✩☆ Pixel Tactics DELUXE! ☆✩~
successes.description: SRPG-style tactical battles, compressed into a pocket-size card game with over 140 hero classes, each with new skills!

Pledges.description: PIXEL FAN - Thanks for becoming a part of Pixel Tactics! We appreciate your support!
All pledge tiers can be customized later through our pledge manager website after the project ends!
PROMO PACK - This pledge covers shipping so that we can send you a promotional card pack! Get all the promos from the game's start up to now, plus some new ones!
TRAINEE PACK - Get Pixel Tactics 1 and the Promotional Card Pack, shipped to you anywhere in the world! It's not Deluxe, but it's still a good place to start.
✩ TACTICIAN PACK - Get Pixel Tactics Deluxe and the Promotional Card Pack! This is the best place to start playing Pixel Tactics! Also includes any unlocked Stretch Goals!
(This tier and all others can be customized with add-ons after the project ends)
✩ LV4 TACTICIAN PACK - Get Pixel Tactics Deluxe, Pixel Tactics 4, and the Promotional Card Pack! Also includes any unlocked Stretch Goals!
DELUXE TACTICIAN PACK - Get PT Deluxe, the Promotional Card Pack, and a Playmat! Also includes any unlocked Stretch Goals!
